title: Enchanted Portals
description:
Get ready for an adventure like no other as rookie magicians Bobby and Penny find themselves stuck between dimensions. As they journey through a variety of enchanting worlds, it’s up to you to help them fight their way back to their own dimension and reclaim the Magic Book. Conquistadorio
With catchy music, charming old-timey art, and non-stop comedy , Enchanted Portals is a co-op 2D platformer that will keep you on your toes. Whether you’re playing solo or with a friend, the magic never stops and the action is always fast-paced and whimsical . Join Bobby and Penny on their quest and see where the adventure takes you

system_requirements.Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 or AMD Radeon R9 280
